trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Choctaw
There were no other sightings in Choctaw on or around June 15th 2012
divs: Sighting DetailsAs we drove south to N.E. 36th street I noticed a light in the distance, so I turned to my friend and said "What is that?", He(My friend) then replied, "It's a helicopter". That's when I said then where are the propellors and why is it all light. He then took a closer look and said "Whatever it is just leave it alone, we don't want to get involved in those sort of tales"! Then I turned the corner and it was GONE! no noise, no trail, no sound. I looked at my friend and said where did it go? He then looked at me and said you properly was imagining it. Then I said "Then how did you see it to? He (My friend) changed the subject and we proceeded home.
Summary: Bright white light just hovering then 10sec. Later nothing. It was gone.
